This video is so so beautiful and encapsulates the strength and emotion of sign language. Thank you Chris, Johnny, Will and Guy for not only being the best band ever with the most beautiful music, but for also genuinely caring and loving people. I know you guys probably won‚Äôt see this but I need you to know how much you‚Äôve impacted my life and supported me through some dark times. You‚Äôre not appreciated enough for your talents and big hearts. Love you loads üß°
